About

My name is Luccas Bonato. I’m an Electrical Engineer student at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte, UFRN.

Some facts about me:

  1. I lived in Kenya for 4 years.
  2. I’m fluent in English and Portuguese.
  3. I dabble a bit of German and Japanese.
  4. I’m a circus, electronics, and game lover.
